about_the_game:
Setting:
The mutation came suddenly.
A mysterious virus attacked everything, transforming everything into a square shape.
Buildings, creatures, even dogs.

You are a dog that has been transformed into a square.
You must go deep into the resort hotel to find your lost family and solve the mystery.


How to Clear:
The door to the hotel room is sealed and you are locked in,
The door to the hotel room is sealed and you are locked in, but if you clear all the squares scattered around the room, the door will open and you will be able to move on.


Controls:
The strange floating paddle on which the dog rides can be operated in various ways!

It can push a large number of objects like a bull tozer,
or swing it like a tennis racket to send things flying far away,
Sometimes they collect things in one place and sometimes they roll them around.

The objects are moving with physical behavior, so you can control them intuitively as if they were right there, and everyone can enjoy the game with a refreshed and exhilarated feeling.


Hotel:
Scattered objects vary from room to room.
Black pollutants are burned in the incinerator, or the luggage of travelers is taken to the collection station,
mysterious precious metals in a collection device, sometimes bold, sometimes subtle.

This new beautiful world combines the retro architectural tones of the 70's with the poly-poly, shiny CG expressions of the 90's.
What lies behind the facility? Will dogs be able to meet their families?
Operation Doggie Doggie is a fun adventure action game with intuitive controls.

name: WANKO WANKO ADVENTURE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: intel Core i7 4770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: A resort hotel where everything has been squared away by a mysterious virus. A dog's great adventure to clear the cubes in closed rooms and search for his stray family!
